Articles.Content: It is a pity that we do not have in the game "automatic start sequence", I mean that the clock is set to the T-2 minutes and when the countdown reaches zero the rocket turns on SAS, and takes off, after reaching direct to popper heading and from that moment rest is in player hand.
When I press the green "Launch" button in the top right of the VAB, it's because I want to launch, not because I want to wait for two minutes and then launch.
